Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its intrinsic worth and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your esteemed position in the market and aligns closely with your business needs and aspirations. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also benefit from a competitive edge in your industry. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product to your organization. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product's features and capabilities. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
